name: SNIPER'S GROUND
description:
Currently Supported HMDs:

  • WMR (Windows Mixed Reality)
  • HTC VIVE

VR Multiplayer Sniping Game that is still under development.

If you like it or hate it please let me know!

Follow Sniper's Ground on other social media:

  • Reddit
  • Discord
  • Facebook
  • Instagram
  • My Personal Twitter

SnipersGround.Com

Videos

NOTES:

This game has voice chat, but I didn't put a way to disable it :) so if you want to disable voice recording simply disable it from Windows.
